1.text: Fold an 8.5 by 11 inch (22 by 28 cm) piece paper in half lengthwise and then unfold it.

2.text: Cut or tear the sheet along the vertical crease.

3.text: Fold 1 of the strips in half lengthwise.

4.text: Fold the lower right corner toward the opposite edge of the paper.

5.text: Flip the triangle toward the left side of the paper.

6.text: Continue folding triangles along the paper until you've reached the end.

7.text: Undo the last 2 folds of the paper.

9.text: Trim about 1 inch (2.5 cm) off the outer point of the righthand triangle.

10.text: Tuck the right side of the new triangle into the pocket on the left.

11.text: Flatten the paper football with your fingers.

12.text: Decorate the paper football if you want to get creative.
